data.actual_result: the upload file bar is always visible
data.expected_result: the upload file bar will disappear when switching to a channel (or just be in every chat, because in dm’s the bar is invisble)
data.short_description: upload file bar glitches if switching between channels. It will take the bar with you if you switch channel. And sometimes it disappears while its in another channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload a large file in a DM (or a smaller file on poor wifi) - switch to a server and slide in to a channel - you see the uploading file bar won’t disappear (sometimes after a while it does disappear)
